page.title: 02Clubs in Scremerston Village
page.content: There have been many clubs in the village but today there are very few left. The main one of these is{Berwick {Rugby Union Club}which has its ground in Scremerston and plays in the{South {of Scotland League.}A{Youth Club}meets every week in the {School}and many activities take place,including snooker,pool,table tennis,darts and handball.Outdoor activities include archery,canoeing,football,rounders, cricket,swingball and swimming.The Youth club is open to anyone over the age of eleven years.A{Brownie Pack meets each week in the{School}and an {Indoor Bowling Club}meets twice a week in{School}from September to May.An {over 60s Club }meets weekly within {Armstrong Court}which is part of the sheltered housing and regular whist drives, bingo sessions and domino matches take place.
